alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Manatee, northwestern Charlotte and Sarasota Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Myakka River State Park, or 15 miles southeast of Sarasota, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Port, Sarasota, Port Charlotte, Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota Springs, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, Southgate, Gulf Gate Estates, Myakka River State Park, The Meadows, Ridge Wood Heights, South Sarasota, Kensington Park, Murdock, Vamo, El Jobean and Oscar Scherer State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
